title: IM LOOKING FOR A TRADE
body: ok so i have an idea to play hecrim with the new skin but im too poor to buy it BUT  i have 3442 rp and would trade for an icon please im desprate {{champion:120}}

replies.body: But..even if you were to buy Hec with RP too 3442 would be plenty?? Did I miss something?
i was thinking the same thing...
